description:
KaOS 2024.07 KDE-centric Linux distro released a new stable ISO with Plasma 6.1.3, KDE Gear 24.05.2, and more upgrades.

The post KaOS Linux 2024.07 Released, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: KaOS Linux 2024.07 Released, Here’s What’s New

description:
Rspamd 3.9 advanced spam filtering system introduces a new GPT module, streamlined Bayes settings, and essential fixes.

The post Rspamd 3.9 Adds New GPT Plugin for Improved Spam Filtering appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Rspamd 3.9 Adds New GPT Plugin for Improved Spam Filtering

description:
Version 0.9.33 of Tux Paint, the open-source children’s drawing software, has been released and is available for various Linux systems, including RHEL, Slackware, and the various distros supported by Flatpak. The source code is also available. This version of Tux Paint is also available for other open-source operating systems (OpenBSD and Haiku OS), as well […]

The post Tux Paint 0.9.33 Released appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Tux Paint 0.9.33 Released

description:
Would openSUSE by any other name still have Tumbleweed and Leap? We’ve looked at the openSUSE name-change controversy and have decided there’s nothing to see here — move on.

The post OMG! SUSE Wants to Take the ‘SUSE’ Out of openSUSE? appeared first on Linux Today.
title: OMG! SUSE Wants to Take the ‘SUSE’ Out of openSUSE?

description:
OpenMandriva Lx 24.07 “ROME” is one of the very first Linux distros to be powered by the latest and greatest Linux 6.10 kernel series, built with Clang, and features the KDE Plasma 6.1 desktop environment by default, while the other two spins offer users the latest GNOME 46.3 and LXQt 2.0 desktop environments.

The post OpenMandriva Lx 24.07 “ROME” Released With KDE Plasma 6 and Linux Kernel 6.10 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: OpenMandriva Lx 24.07 “ROME” Released With KDE Plasma 6 and Linux Kernel 6.10

description:
Audacity 3.6.1 update fixes critical bugs, including crashes with multichannel audio exports and clip pasting. Here’s more on that!

The post Audacity 3.6.1 Update Fixes Critical Crashes appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Audacity 3.6.1 Update Fixes Critical Crashes
